item.description:
Learn everything there to know about 6s, subtypes of 6, challenges and growth for 6s and how to relate to 6s and 6s to other types. Perfect for 6s and anyone in relationship to a 6 in the present or past, as well as anyone interested in learning more about 6s.

7:30-9:30pm

$40

Herb Pearce is a leading teacher of the Enneagram, having taught over 2000 workshops on it, as well as being the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram, Herb's Tips for Living, and the soon to be The Advanced Book on the Enneagram. He is a therapist who uses the Enneagram in his work with individuals, couples and families, as well as teaching it in organizations for team building and staff development.

781 648 3737      
www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Type 6 Workshop (for 6s and anyone in relationship to a 6)
